General.Name: Goldstone Technologies Limited
General.Description: Goldstone Technologies Limited provides business intelligence (BI), data analytics, and information technology (IT) services consulting services in India and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Information Technology/Software Services and Software License. It offers various product solutions, such as Alteryx, a self-service data analytics platform with advanced data science capabilities; Fivetran, an automated data integration solution that enables data sync from various databases and cloud applications; Neo4j, a graph data technology platform; Snowflake data cloud platform; Kyvos, a cloud BI acceleration platform; Tableau, a analytics platform for data-driven decision making; and Unscrambl, an AI-powered analyst to connect, converse, and collaborate. The company also provides BI and analytics consulting solutions; GTL Akademia; data lifecycle diagnostics; technical support as a services; IT staff augmentation services; and cloud services. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
